subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Running
lead_paragraph: World champion Bernard Lagat of the U.S. failed to qualify for the Olympic 1,500 meters final on Sunday, dashing American hopes of their first title in the event in 100 years.
snippet: World champion Bernard Lagat of the U.S. failed to qualify for the Olympic 1,500 meters final on Sunday, dashing American hopes of their first title in the event in 100 years.
